channel.title: Matthew P. Slanker on skb.io
channel.description: Recent content in Matthew P. Slanker on skb.io

item.title: Booting with PXE
item.description: This was a port of an old article from my gitbook.com page. The information within may be out of date. Overview # Goal: Enable PXE booting on the home network for both BIOS and UEFI machines.

item.title: Creative Coding
item.description: I have always been interested in art. When I was younger I took my sketchbook and pencils everywhere I went. So, it is no surprise that I am still fascinated by art, especially computer generated art.

item.title: About The Authors

item.title: Angular + FastAPI with OpenAPI Generator
item.description: This is an incomplete article. I will be adding to it as I go. Since this was a fairly arduous learning experience I am documenting this for later reference. I am sure I have done many things wrong during this process and comments regarding better ways to do are always appreciated.

item.title: Docker Contexts & Synology
item.description: Overview # Goal # To be able to use docker context on my local machine to issue commands against the Docker instance on my Synology NAS. Assumptions # Unless specifically requested I won’t be covering the following here:

item.title: A place for various projects
item.description: Started a new site to keep track of things I work on. More coming (hopefully) soon.
